trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref> method can be called.
`true`, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref> method can be called; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref> method can be called.
`true`, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref> method can be called, otherwise `false`.
The default is `false`.
Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is called by the design host, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
A string of XML data.
Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XML file name.
Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
The path to the view to retrieve.
The design-time data source view object for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
The component.

Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
An `IDictionary` of properties.
Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
`true` to suppress schema UI events; otherwise, `false`.

Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data"></xref> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile"></xref> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XSL data string.

Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data"></xref> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile"></xref> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
The XSLT file name.

Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data"></xref> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile"></xref> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XPath query.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
`true` if the data source can be configured; otherwise `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
`true` if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView(System.String)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
The name of a view in the underlying data source.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object containing information about the identified view, or `null` if a view with the specified name is not found.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
An array of names of the views in the data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
Specifies whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
